src:
Apple, Wistron propose possibility of directly investing in Japan Display - Kyodo

01 Nov 2019, 13:55

Apple Inc and Taiwan's Wistron Corp are proposing the possibility of directly investing in troubled panel supplier Japan Display , Kyodo News reported on Friday.
TOKYO: Apple Inc and Taiwan's Wistron Corp are proposing the possibility of directly investing in troubled panel supplier Japan Display , Kyodo News reported on Friday.
(Reporting by Chris Gallagher; Editing by Muralikumar Anantharaman)

Source: Reuters
